profile:
As the founder and owner of “Mountain View Inspections Inc”, I provide the following as a brief introduction to and overview off the services offered.  
Mission Statement:  Committed to providing a professional inspection service that is based on Integrity, Quality and Client Satisfaction.
CERTIFIED by the “INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF CERTIFIED HOME INSPECTORS” (InterNACH)  and by the “INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF CERTIFIED INDOOR AIR CONSULTANTS” (IAC2). http://www.nachi.org   http://www.nachi.org/sop.htm http://www.nachi.org/code_of_ethics.htm http://iac2.org/
  
Extensive knowledge of and experience in the construction, maintenance and inspection of Commercial Inspections.   http://www.nachi.org/comsop.htm
Mountain View Inspections Inc. is independently owned and locally operated. We hold an active membership and are in good standing with “InterNACHI” the largest Association of Home Inspectors in the world.  This association provides a great opportunity for continuing education, which is instrumental to us being able to provide a better service to you, our clients.
   
The following is a list of services that are currently being offered by “Mountain View Inspections Inc.” to perspective clients in Goose Bay, Labrador West, and all remaining areas of Labrador. 
•	Pre – listing home and commercial inspections for seller http://www.moveincertified.com/ and http://www.nachi.org/fetchreportfriendlyseal.htm
•	Pre – purchase home and commercial inspections for buyer 
•	1 year Atlantic Home warranty inspections
•	Project oversight   http://www.overseeit.com/
•	Mold Investigations and Testing
•	Insurance Inspections 
Should you have a need for specialized services, other than those listed, we have available through InterNACHI qualified personnel to respond to your needs, please ask for details.
 Additional Qualifications
•	Journeyman Carpenter with extensive experience in residential and commercial building and renovations.
•	Strong technical background with extensive experience in Residential and Commercial inspections, Project Management and Property Management.

My Promise to You
Choosing the right inspector can be difficult. Unlike most professionals, you probably will not get to meet me until after you hire me. Other inspectors may offer a different set of qualifications and experience, and yes, they may even offer lower pricing. Ultimately a successful inspection will heavily depend on the inspector’s knowledge and own individual effort. Regardless of the task, I guarantee that I will give you my very best effort. This I promise you.

To book your inspection today please call (709) 899-0354 or visit  http://www.inspectorseek.com/
